thread.title: These 7 Bollywood Actresses Went Blonde, And We’re Loving It!
thread.title_full: These 7 Bollywood Actresses Went Blonde, And We’re Loving It!

title: These 7 Bollywood Actresses Went Blonde, And We’re Loving It!
text:
facebook 
Blonde highlights invoke a bittersweet feeling in us. We will never be able to erase the early 2000s trend of Bollywood actors, with frosted tips and highlights, from our minds. But, on the other hand, the flawless, face-framing blonde highlights our favourite actresses are currently sporting, are giving us serious hope. With artistic techniques like balayage, ombre, babylighting, and eclipting, we have hope that the disastrous blonde highlights of yesteryears may never make a comeback. And these are the Bollywood actresses with new-age blonde highlights, who we are totally in love with. Kajol
